Currently looking for a Guidewire Requirements Analyst in Columbus, Ohio.

Manage a comprehensive full-cycle recruiting process for all areas of information technology across various locations at Nationwide. Finding active and passive candidates using proactive sourcing methods; high touch direct sourcing and networking to find top candidates for current and future openings. Instrumental in salary and bonus negotiations, relocation assistance and intercompany transfers within the region. Work side-by-side with hiring managers and HR business partners to streamline the job requirements approval process.  Track and report key metrics designed to measure and predict staffing activity.Selected Contributions:Appointed as a brand ambassador to lead career events and hire qualified candidates on the spot. Mentor and provide on the job training or orientation for new employees.Increased the number of diversity hires and lowered the amount of time to fill open positions.Tenured Lead IT Recruiter appointed to source for most highly visible positions within the company.

Recruited for all corporate positions. Handled high-volume recruiting in a fast paced, unstructured environment, adhering to strict tight deadlines and aggressive hiring goals. Led weekly management meetings to establish hiring priorities and developed plans to meet hiring targets. Managed the process of internal promotion/transfers to various departments within hospital system. Sourced candidates via Career Builder, Monster and networked to find passive candidates. Trusted to deal with highly sensitive and confidential information in a discreet and appropriate manner. Selected Contributions:Developed key relationships with high-caliber candidates within the industry via traditional networking techniques and referral-based candidate sourcing.Worked closely with hiring managers and colleagues to ensure EEOC hiring practices and compliance documentation.Investigated, fielded, and resolved certain employee relations issues and benefit inquiries.

Participated in full cycle recruiting including technical screenings, interviews and onboarding paperwork. Assisted with leading status meetings to monitor recruiting process and critical client requirements. Managed relationships with external employees to ensure both client and employee needs are being met.Selected Contributions:Trained and provided guidance to contractors across organization nationally. Lead on recruitment outreach including career fairs, industry recruitment events and online sources.
